mount_sofs11.h File Reference

Detailed Description

The SOFS11 mounting tool.

(interface file)

It provides a simple method to integrate the SOFS11 file system into Linux. * SINOPSIS: 

                mount_sofs11 [OPTIONS] supp-file mount-point
                  OPTIONS:
                   -d       --- set debugging mode (default: no debugging)
                   -l depth --- set log depth (default: 0,0)
                   -L file  --- log file (default: stdout)
                   -h       --- print this help.
